attributes.action: Make supermarkets to sanitise shopping trolleys & baskets, prevent COVID 19
attributes.additional_details: There must be a common place where the virus is spreading and we all go shopping. Most supermarkets are not even doing the basic hygiene clean and we have a virus which is highly transmissible and fatal. Most supermarkets have just put up sanitisation stations for customers to use rather than taking the responsibility for ensuring that each shopping trolley and basket handles are cleaned and sanitised after each use. Thousands of hands are being touched and we have a pandemic.
attributes.background: Supermarkets to ensure that each shopping trolley and basket handles are sanitised after each use and even providing customer gloves at entry and are disposed off after shopping. This is to  prevent the spread and cross contamination of COVID 19.
